div.class: custom_146167 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

span.span: School buildings are closed for the rest of the school year
Learning will continue at home until the last day of school
May 8 will be our last day of school
Our continuous learning plan will be aligned with the Oklahoma guidelines, which are expected to be released this week
We will provide a way for everyone to learn, regardless of Internet access
No student’s letter grade will decrease after March 13
No Attendance will be recorded after March 13
Free grab and go meals will continue as long as there is a need​​

span.font: How the students will get their belongings – the administration is developing a plan
When the graduation ceremony will be held and what it will look like

strong.span: We hope to host an interactive virtual meeting with parents
strong.br: when our continuous learning plan is completed.

div.p:
$200 installation (includes first month)
$50 per month
No data limits no contracts

25 MB – $55.00 per month
$150 basic Installation – $75 Wireless Router
No Contract, Unlimited Data

div.class: custom_72126 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

div.p: Our school has set up a Shutterfly Storefront where local families can make purchases on Shutterfly and 8% of all purchases will come directly to our school. There is no cost to our school or to our parents. Please help us by clicking on the website before placing your order with Shutterfly!
